In modern times thc antiquities of Sinai were discovered by
Niebuhr in 1762, and he published an account of them in
17714. They were next examined hy Seetzen in 1809; 1111
Huntin in 1311 3 by Burckhardt in 11112 and 11113: by Riippell
in 13131; hy Ricci and Linant in 1820; by 11.121113111511111 in 1333; by
